name: Editor X
description:
Editor X - Figma to Responsive Site (Beta) 


Export your Figma designs to Editor X for a fast, effective way to start creating your next code-free website. 


*Please note that this plugin is in its first release for testing, and under active development. We are constantly optimizing the process and collecting feedback to make the experience flawless. If you have any suggestions or comments, please send them to hi@editorx.com*


Editor X is an advanced, fully collaborative website creation platform. With it, creators can build responsive sites with complete design control using CSS and flexbox technology, powered by smooth drag and drop. This combined with built-in business infrastructure makes it a full-stack solution for web creators.


This plugin was designed to make migrating Figma designs to Editor X an easy, quick and efficient process. 


During the migration, your design assets, styles and structure are moved to Editor X, Figma frames are converted to Editor X pages and elements are turned into components. 


Once the transfer process is complete, you can build a fully responsive site on Editor X. On the platform youâ€™ll have complete control over your design plus the ability to add interaction effects, advanced functionality using custom code and integrated business solutions.


Learn more about Editor X at editorx.com and get in touch at hi@editorx.com.
